text: Lophira is a genus of plants in the family Ochnaceae. Almost every part of Lophira (bark, root bark, leaves, and leafy shoots) is used for various medicinal purposes. Species include: * Lophira alata Banks ex C.F.Gaertn. * Lophira lanceolata Tiegh. ex Keay Category:Ochnaceae Category:Malpighiales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lophira
